channel.title: Leo Suter on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Leo Suter on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Lynley’: Leo Suter Has Wrestled Vikings and Swung Axes, But Faced an Even Bigger Test on This Set
item.description: “That was my Saigon,” the star shares about the challenge that he, and his Chelsea boots, faced during the Ireland shoot for the BritBox and BBC show with Sofia Barclay, based on the Elizabeth George

item.title: ‘Lynley’: Leo Suter Has Wrestled Vikings and Swung Axes, But Faced an Even Bigger Test on This Set
item.description: “That was my Saigon,” the star shares about the challenge that he, and his Chelsea boots, faced during the Ireland shoot for the BritBox and BBC show with Sofia Barclay, based on the Elizabeth George

item.title: Jonah Hauer-King and Kristine Froseth Star in Anna Biller’s Ghost Story ‘The Face of Horror’ (Exclusive First Look)
item.description: The macabre, medieval-set feature, now shooting in Prague, follows a knight who marries his devoted love after murdering her father — only to betray her for a wealthier bride.
